name: Death's Garden (NathanielMejia)
description:
Plant crops, fight monsters, and trade with Death to get new weapons and crops. How long can you survive?

HTML5 Client contains a few graphical bugs, for the best experience, please use the exe.

Definitely cut this one close, but a fun game jam nonetheless

Discord Username: Borbito#0304

made for GDL August 2022 Jam!
